head.citation-title: New Set of Invariant Quaternion Krawtchouk Moments for Color Image Representation and Recognition
head.abstracts: © 2022 World Scientific Publishing Company.One of the most often used techniques to represent color images is quaternion algebra. This study introduces the quaternion Krawtchouk moments, QKrMs, as a new set of moments to represent color images. Krawtchouk moments (KrMs) represent one type of discrete moments. QKrMs use traditional Krawtchouk moments of each color channel to describe color images. This new set of moments is defined by using orthogonal polynomials called the Krawtchouk polynomials. The stability against the translation, rotation, and scaling transformations for QKrMs is discussed. The performance of the proposed QKrMs is evaluated against other discrete quaternion moments for image reconstruction capability, toughness against various types of noise, invariance to similarity transformations, color face image recognition, and CPU elapsed times.

affiliation.ce:source-text: Department of Basic Sciences, Faculty of Engineering, Sinai University, North Sinai 45511, Egypt

source.sourcetitle: International Journal of Image and Graphics

coredata.dc:description: One of the most often used techniques to represent color images is quaternion algebra. This study introduces the quaternion Krawtchouk moments, QKrMs, as a new set of moments to represent color images. Krawtchouk moments (KrMs) represent one type of discrete moments. QKrMs use traditional Krawtchouk moments of each color channel to describe color images. This new set of moments is defined by using orthogonal polynomials called the Krawtchouk polynomials. The stability against the translation, rotation, and scaling transformations for QKrMs is discussed. The performance of the proposed QKrMs is evaluated against other discrete quaternion moments for image reconstruction capability, toughness against various types of noise, invariance to similarity transformations, color face image recognition, and CPU elapsed times.
coredata.prism:publicationName: International Journal of Image and Graphics
coredata.dc:title: New Set of Invariant Quaternion Krawtchouk Moments for Color Image Representation and Recognition
